TopicTitle: Map gets distorted after right mouse clicking on kerbin

Articles.Content:
I was spamming my right mouse button on kerbin in map view because i wanted to select a vessel, but then suddenly the map  view was taken over by the kraken as seen in the images I've posted in the discord ksp2_screenshots (see link below). I think it is the texture of clouds but then through the whole kerbal system 

https://discord.com/channels/1039959585949237268/1078459801522147468/1086728268104859659
